data.conf_selectivity_h: Selectivity level on high band Val : 0 to 5 [default:0]
data.conf_selectivity_l: Selectivity level on low band Val : 0 to 5 [default:0]0
data.conf_sensitivity_h: Sensitivity level on high bandVal : 0 to 4 [default:0 or 4]
data.conf_sensitivity_l: Sensitivity level on low bandVal : 0 to 4 [default:0 or 4]
data.conf_dsptrigger_h: DSP triggering level on high band Val : 4 to 20 [default:6]
data.conf_dsptrigger_l: DSP triggering level on low band Val : 4 to 20 [default:8]
data.conf_rflinktrigger_h: RFLink Trigger level on high band Val : 4 to 20 [default:10]
data.conf_rflinktrigger_l: RFLink Trigger level on low band Val : 4 to 20 [default:12]
data.conf_lbt: Listen Before Talk Level Val : 6 to 30 [default:16 Inhib:0]
